text: Frank Bresee (August 20, 1929 â€“ June 5, 2018) was an American radio personality and historian. Bresee was born in Los Angeles, California. He hosted the "Golden Days Of Radio" program which began in 1949 and aired on the Armed Forces Radio Network from 1967 to 1995. Bresee died on June 5, 2018 of complications from dementia at the age of 88. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from dementia Category:American radio personalities Category:American historians Category:Entertainers from Los Angeles
title: Frank Bresee
